alert.note: Alert for Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 5:47PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Bent County through 615 PM MDT... At 545 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of John Martin Reservoir, or 22 miles east of North La Junta, moving southeast at 20 mph. This storm was producing very heavy rain. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph, nickel size hail and very torrential rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Localized rural flash flooding will be possible with this storm. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Bent County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
